title: (x) Mogwai: Come On Die Young album cover - Insignia {Yves}
content:
Hi there, I'm hoping one of you might be able to help me identify the font used on this album cover:   
   
[IMG] [http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v411/JRBedford/ComeOnDieYoung.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000643/http:/img.photobucket.com/albums/v411/JRBedford/ComeOnDieYoung.jpg)[/IMG]   
   
If any of you can offer any ideas, I'd really appreciate your help.   
   
Thankyou
author: infinitefury

comments.content: Wow - spot on! Thanks Yves that's saved me a lot of head-scratching.
